resources.string: Major phases of SDLC, Web Services, Design Patterns, SOA, Java Programming, Dot Net Programming, Oracle PL/SQL.

array.name: work_tasks
array.item: Made key contributions to back-end software development and implementation \nRecommended and executed improvements which resulted in a 65% increase in performance

Produced clean, efficient code in Python, C and C++ based on specifications \nContributed to development of organizational flow software enabling teams to manage multiple tasks, oversee scheduling, and set time limits

Successfully developed two major projects for client PDF Solutions in San Jose, CA, to improve quality of computer chip manufacturing \nEnsured timely completion of complex projects despite challenging deadlines
